summary.para: Gets the number of strings in the string list.

returns.para: Returns the number of strings in the string list.

summary.para: Copies the locale name with the specified index to the specified array.

param.name: listIndex
param.para: Zero-based index of the locale name.

param.name: localeName
param.para: Character array that receives the locale name.

param.name: size
param.para: Size of the array in characters. The size must include space for the terminating null character.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the length in characters (not including the null terminator) of the locale name with the specified index.

param.name: listIndex
param.para: Zero-based index of the locale name.

param.name: length
param.para: Receives the length in characters, not including the null terminator.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Copies the string with the specified index to the specified array.

param.name: stringBuffer
param.para: Character array that receives the string.

param.name: stringBufferSize
param.para: Size of the array in characters. The size must include space for the terminating null character.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the length in characters (not including the null terminator) of the string with the specified index.

param.name: length
param.para: Receives the length in characters of the string, not including the null terminator.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Represents a collection of strings indexed by number.An IDWriteStringList is identical to IDWriteLocalizedStrings except for the semantics, where localized strings are indexed on language (each language has one string property) whereas IDWriteStringList may contain multiple strings of the same language, such as a string list of family names from a font set. You can QueryInterface from an IDWriteLocalizedStrings to an IDWriteStringList.
